meanings.sent1: Her unrivalled talent in painting won her many awards.
meanings.sent2: The team's unrivalled performance secured them the championship.
meanings.sent3: His unrivalled speed in eating hot dogs always amazed his friends.
meanings.sent4: The unrivalled beauty of the sunset painted the sky in vibrant colors.
meanings.sent5: The unrivalled view from the mountaintop took their breath away.

meanings.definition: Surpassing all others in quality or excellence.
meanings.sent1: The chef's unrivalled culinary skills made his restaurant famous.
meanings.sent2: The unrivalled taste of the homemade pie delighted everyone at the party.
meanings.sent3: The unrivalled speed of the tortoise in the race was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her unrivalled kindness towards animals touched everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent5: The unrivalled beauty of the garden left visitors in awe.
